title: Building Games with Unity
content: Unity has been my go-to engine for learning the basics of game development. In this article, I’ll walk through how I built my first game, Block Breaker, using C# and Unity’s physics engine. I also discuss the challenges I faced while designing game mechanics and polish.

title: Exploring OpenGL Shaders
content: Shaders are the heart of real-time rendering. In this post, I dive into how I started working with GLSL, the different types of shaders (vertex, fragment), and how to write custom lighting effects for 3D models using OpenGL.
